data.text: @people It's amazing that people take this boys bullying and turn it into racism and scams because  of a photo. Everyone has their right to live and look the way they do without being bullied. Stay out of their business
@people One of the biggest scams this year

@NehoNana @people Yes!! My daughter had a kid messing with her in 6th grade and her dad let her try and handle but it didn’t help so he went and set things straight. She didn’t have issues with this kid again. That is what parents are for!! 💪🏼
@missy_villa1501 @people Amen. I said the same. I'd be in the school office so fast......

@people His mother is disgraceful for exploiting her son. She should never have taken a video of her son, and posted for the world to see.  It exposed this family's issue, and that poor kid will actually suffer more.

@people How is being bullied a reason to have people donate money this is the most pointless  video and further more what kind of parent records their child's sad and troubled life moment and the. Broadcast s it to the world
@people Showing ur video to my  9 and 6 yr old. Both girls and they will cry and want to be Keaton’s friend, and protect him! No matter who his dad is!!!!! Or isn’t!
@people Did his nose get bigger since the last video?

@people Poor kid. I can’t imagine how he feels after being bullied at school and now on media. He’s a kid and that’s all that counts ❤️. His mom needs to make this right for him. God bless his heart ♥️

@paintercrystal @people She made the video to INTENTIONALLY SCAM AMERICANS OUT OF THE THOUSANDS OF $$$$$ that was of course sent. She is nothing but a skanky racist piece of shit willing to EXPLOIT THE FUCK out of her kid. Thats NOT a mom. Its a dripping pustulant twat.

@people Go to your skanky racist POS mom and say "Mom, thanks to the fact that you are such a poece of garbage the entire country has now seen that you tried to scam them out of a few Thosands and that makes you feel awful. STOP TRYING TO USE THIS KID TO REHAB YOUR IMAGE.

@people As a mother instead of recording my son that upset I would take action. People are way too quick to pull out their phone and post to social media without any regard for who it may affect. Mom needs to stop and handle this situation off cameras.

@people Mayb bc his mom made the situation 10x worse. Poor kid. & honestly, @gofundme should donate that money raised bc i dont c how money will help ppl to stop bullying him. It sadly sounds like a scam. Making a GoFundMe is for ppl who actually need help financially.
@people  https://t.co/d0FkT2Erod

@people It does not matter why this little fella was bullied. He is innocent regardless. His life became the responsibility of the public the moment his video went live & every single one of you that made hateful (or anything but supportive) comments added to his burden. You. You. You.

@people I hate that his Mom recorded that instead of sitting at home having a conversation later. She does this like 5 mins after it happened (fake exaggerated timeline by me) hug your son and talk to him. THEN make a video discussion.
@people Stop👏🏻giving👏🏻these👏🏻racist👏🏻money-hungry👏🏻bullies👏🏻airtime
@doodlehedz @people Wait so posing with a piece of cloth makes you racist? Asking for a friend.
@people  https://t.co/9tEwXddoeh
@people @benshapiro you were right.

@people This is 100% the parent’s fault for being racist lunatics. Nothing about her taking a pic w.the confederate flag smiling so wide & then having the kids hold it too, is not “funny” or “ironic.” Why did he need $$ in the first place for being bullied? Story is whack!
@people Sweetie, be strong, face those bullies, show them they cannot and will not beat you down! We are all behind you! I love how brave you ate❤️❤️
